The Canary Island are unique in being a Spanish island group off the coast of Africa. They stand out for their volcanic islands with generally sunny weather. They have the standard European bollard with an orange rectangle inside the black section- similar to Portugalâ€™s bollards. The Canary Islands stand out for their volcanic rocks, blue skies and steep drops into the ocean. A type of bollard with the typical European white and black style enclosing an orange rectangle is found in the Canary Islands. Similar looking bollards are also found rarely in Portugal.
